website_summaries.verdict: A all-natural calming collar that customers swear by. Dogs start calming shortly after collar is put on.
pros: This adjustable calming dog collar uses natural ingredients and can be used for cats or dogs
cons: Many customers found the scent overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: This Collar? Alright alright alright.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo, Day 1 of using this product made my dog seem really, really stoned. However, it also seems to have relieved some anxiety in that she doesn’t whine at one of our neighbor dogs walking by outside. She also didn’t hide under the couch when folks down the street set off some fireworks...or maybe those were distress flares? During the ‘Rona, one can’t be certain. The collar definitely has a distinct smell, it reminds me of mild floral soap, so I don’t much mind it. The dog has paid closer attention to me on walks as we work on loose-leash walking, too. Will report in a few days as to continued effects.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: The Best Calming Collar Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first when I got this item, but the calmness around people and other things has been tremendous. My dog deals with anxiety and since he has gotten older I decided to wean him off the Prozac so he is barely on it, and before I got the collar he would be agitated sometimes, but this collar has helped with that, and then smell will make you feel like you are being relaxed or want one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: PattiJ

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This collar did not work for my small dog. The smell was strong for the first day, then nothing. The company also offered a $30.00 gift card for a good review, so be very leery of all the great reviews! Very disappointed in this waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: JJCRB

customer_reviews.title: Collar is reducing dogs anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a shelter dog. Have had her for 1 1/2 months. Hides all the time, would not come near me and shakes with fear. She was used for breeding and kept in kennel for years prior to me adopting her. I was trying to find something to calm her anxiety so i read great reviews on this collar. She has had it on for 5 days. She now approaches me to give her treats and now will come in the same room that i am in. Her shaking has much improved. I definitely think this collar is working. I give it a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Jean Grant

customer_reviews.title: Works for stressful instances
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the concept works! It is easy to cut down to size and put on. Our dog didn't experience discomfort. We had enough left over from the rubber strip to be able to swap in scrap pieces onto the collar. The scent is very strong at first and worked immediately to calm our 5 month chihuahua terrier mutt. Cons: the scent dissipated quickly. Even adding in the scrap rubber pieces, the collar has lost its use after two weeks. For the price, I would hope it would last longer. Not bad and I would buying again just to help our pup get through major stress events (moving, long car ride, vet, ect). For daily use it is impractical.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Mora

customer_reviews.title: Total fail and disappointment! My Chihuahua shook like a leaf.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not work. I have tried everything for my poor little girl! Thunder jackets! Calming bites! You name it! This collar did absolutely no good! As you can see from the video I have posted of my Chihuahua, she was terrified, panting, and her heart was beating a mile a minute! We tried it for a couple of weeks - I was soooo hoping it would be successful since the reviews seemed so good! But then when I received in the mail a coupon for $5.00 if I would write a good review ... now I understand why there are so many good ones. This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Faust

customer_reviews.title: It actually works, Stitch approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog has insane energy and anxiety. I really have tried everything and didn’t honestly believe this collar would work. I went into this very skeptical after trying prescriptions, natural supplements, etc. And it actually worked, it was insane. He was much calmer and less anxious on walks around cars. As soon as the month was up I noticed his anxiety coming back and it was time to order his new one. They last a month and buying these once a month is way cheaper than repurchasing supplements or getting medication. I’m obsessed ! Stitch my pug approved and it doesn’t bother him at all even with his sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: After 48 hours, I decided to remove the collars from my dogs [2 neutered males, over 13 yrs old - 60 lbs each]. I did not observe any change in either dogs' behavior during the time the collars were on. The smell on the collar is pretty intense and off-putting [in my opinion]. The smell reminds me of bad after-shave or cheap men's cologne. Wish it would have worked because meds I've tried for their anxious behavior during Fireworks Season [May - September in Saint Paul] were too strong and just doped up the dogs into a stupor.
customer_reviews.author: Juanda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good chemistry but poor collar quality
customer_reviews.text: I think the pheromones work. But the quality of the collar itself is really poor. We put it on our 10lb 4 month Frenchie puppy and she scratched at it overnight. In the morning we looked at it and it was already so beat up looking and the buckles look like they’re years old after only one night. Sad because I think this does actually calm her a bit but no way it’d even last a week. Also note it comes off really easy from the puppy’s natural horseplay and the scent, while pleasant to the nose, is very strong and rubs off on anything it comes in contact with including hands, clothes, furniture, fur, etc. We’re returning it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best pheromone collar on the market, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used adaptil brand diffusers with GREAT success, just never saw the same results in their collars. I have a senior Irish Setter who now has anxiety worsening with old age. After reading all of the reviews on this one, I decided to give it a shot. Let me just say.... I have never and would never have expected it to work almost instantly but it did! The collar itself smells of lavender and chamomile, not overpowering and fades within a week or so. My dog has been calm, has slept through the night and not reacting as severely to his triggers. Ordering a second for my other dog and I will be recommending this collar to my clients!!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Appears effective - strong lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Fedciory Calming Collar for my 2 year old Cockapoo because of a recent move. The collar is constructed well and is very long (25"), you can trim to size. Be aware, the description notes this as a "lavender collar," the scent is very strong for the first few days of use. Other pheromone collars such as the Adaptil brand do not have a scent. I don't think this is a good or bad thing, just FYI if you/ your dog is sensitive to strong odors. Overall I'm satisfied with the collar- my dog appears to be handling separation and barking from apartment noises better.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynne D.

customer_reviews.title: Our dog is smiling!!!
customer_reviews.text: We brought in a stray Pyrenees a couple years ago who is very sensitive, meaning fearful. She’s afraid of men and acts like a dog who wasn’t treated well. She also likes to escape for a week at a time or so. I managed to get one of these on her before she got out last time. Now she’s back, after 5 days, we realize how much happier she is. She’s not as fearful and is certainly more relaxed! This has been a constant concern for us, and her welfare, and I’m THRILLED with this collar!!! It appears to have brought out the dog she Should be! I’m ecstatic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Grum

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 20lb cockapoo who gets anxiety around large groups of people. We were planning on having people over for a friend's birthday and wow! My pup acted like there was no one else there and was hanging out in the yard with us instead of barking at people and hiding. I am very impressed. I will continue to use this in situations that stress him out.
customer_reviews.author: Devon B.

customer_reviews.title: Natural alternative to dog's anxiety
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these collars for our frightened pups. Thunderstorms and fireworks cause sleepless nights around here and we don't like to medicate so I gave these a try. They seem to lessen the anxiety level of both dogs during loud events and even just around the house. They have a pleasant scent and are easy on and easy off. I can't say the design is perfect as you have to continuously tighten, seems to slip after a day or so. Worried one will fall off on a walk but for the most part we are pleased and impressed with product.
customer_reviews.author: islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: It's a Miracle!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new rescue dog was rescued from a home where she was terrorized by 3 young children,she could not stop shaking and peeing herself whenever she heard any slight noise. After putting on the collar,15 min later she was stretched out in the sun. ,snoring!! This collar has been miraculous! Now she can focus and show us how very smart she is. Its been about a month now and I can say that she is happy,calm and is much more in control of things! Thank you for helping her adjust,I highly recommend this product! .
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth armstrong kolodziejski

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and helpful for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: At the recommendation of a friend, I researched various scent collars to reduce his stress. I selected the Calming Pheromone Collar because of the reviews and price. At slightly over 50 cents a day I can afford to replace this collar every month on subscription. The scent is really nice and it works. He still needs some additional calming tools if I leave the house but just home during the day he is more relaxed. I also think he is sleeping better at night. Thanks for something affordable and really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas

customer_reviews.title: Calming Collar factor for my Corgi
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old Corgi that still thinks he's an 8 week old pup. Barks at everything, hyper towards other dogs, etc. The collar managed to calm him down with the pheromones. Scent is a pleasant ones towards humans as well. It takes about 30-60min for it to start calming my dog so plan around walks or thunderstorms. Easy on/off collar as it has "notches" to lock in each length of collar. Fits a wide arrange which is nice so you're not guessing the size. Will plan on buying for the summer months as that is when he's most active.
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog more aggressive.
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dog so aggressive. I had to take it off of him because it did the opposite of calming him down. He was biting me and would not stop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Frankenfield

customer_reviews.title: This collar really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that is anxious about a lot of things - but most especially thunder, fireworks, gunshots, cars back-firing... when I saw these collars advertised I thought I could give it a try - many of the other calming chews have not worked... I am happy to report that, while it has not solved her anxiety completely, she is far calmer with the collar - far less time spent quivering in the bathtub when there's a thunderstorm. [yes, we use a Thundershirt too - I recommend those as well.] Good product that works. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Best Calming Collar
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 month old purebred Siberian Husky and she's been so stressed out with rehoming with me, she also had puppies before she was a year so that adds to her stress. I bought this on a whim hoping that it would at least help her sleep through the night and not have so many "zoomies" during the day and night. It HELPED SO MUCH. She's so chill now and honestly I will probably buy this for the rest of her puppy years just so she feels better. So worth the money and so worth the look on my dog's face that tells me she's relaxed and happy. Thank you Fedciory!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Dog behavior game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very fearful and anxious dog. We have trained her extensively and put her on doggy Prozac, but nothing has made a large impact on her anxiety. I was skeptical about this collar but I ordered this collar on my vet's recommendation and I am so grateful I did! Literally when I opened the package my dog started to watch her tail from across the room. Since she has been wearing the collar, her anxiety and fearful responses to stressors has lessened. I am a believer! I will update my review again once she has worn the collar for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Okay so being honest, I don’t know if it’s calming my dog or not...I think it is, but let me just say that we love the smell so much that my family wants her wearing it all of the time. I actually mentioned to my kids that maybe we are the ones who should be wearing it. The texture and the thickness are wonderful. It fits securely and seems very comfortable, unlike the other one I bought when this was out of stock. Returned that one right away due to it smelling like chemicals and being very uncomfortable on the dog. Four paws and two thumbs up on this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Horrible strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I have used pheromone products in the past and none smelled as horrendous as these.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Luce

customer_reviews.title: So far so well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, I was ultra skeptical of this. I have an extremely anxious cattle dog that has not taken nicely to our newest puppy that we got a year ago in August. I got this collar for her and she, within the last month of wearing the collar, started to lay next to out newest pup and a lot cuddlier. I just bought the second collar for her because she has started to get testy with him again, after a month and half use, and I am hoping it helps again.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these collars after it was recommended by my vet and I regret not doing it sooner. My coonhound mix is from a shelter and struggles with separation anxiety and nervousness. At first the smell is quite strong, but didn't offend me as I think it smells good. He's getting used to it and I really do believe it helps when he gets antsy. I'm hoping it will help with thunderstorms and fireworks too, but that still to be determined. I'll definitely repurchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes

customer_reviews.title: Icky scent
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on our dog's anxiety, which is fine, you never know and it was just an experiment. However, the scent reminds me of a stale wet essential oiled spa towel. Like they are going for eucalyptus and verbena but missed their mark. Very strong too - quite overpowering - could always find the dog based on the smell in the air haha! Gave it three weeks but the odor almost made us take the collar off before giving it a chance to work. Had to wash her to get the smell off of her fur. Hope it works better for others!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, it DOES help!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog who has terrible separation anxiety, probably the worst I have ever seen in a dog. He pants really bad, whines, tries to escape out of the kennel and does seem to calm down until I am home. I tried this collar after a recommendation from our vet. He still has the separation anxiety but the symptoms are much more mild. He now is a lot calmer and seems to chill out quicker than before. We will definitely be purchasing these monthly (as recommended by the vet & manufacture).
customer_reviews.author: amkettle

customer_reviews.title: Good holistic approach to calming a pup
customer_reviews.text: I have a foster dog suffering from separation anxiety. He barks when out of sight and disliked being crated. I don't want to make him dependent on meds for treatment when someone adopts him, so a friend told me about pheromone collars. This one seems to help. I am not too fond of smelling the collar, but it is a pleasant enough scent and not to bothersome or overpowering. He has calmed significantly in the week we have had this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Huner

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Collar!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my forever puppy that was super stressed because of the screaming of my autistic child. She would not leave my bedroom. Well it worked wonderfully she is much calmer and now leaves the room and is normal again. When you open the package the smell is strong for a human but it goes away and still has “the power” for the dog. Will buy another when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Roshie

customer_reviews.title: It drugged our dog.
customer_reviews.text: It drugged our dog. After I put it on, our little girl just laid around and wouldn't eat. She kept scratching at her neck, so we took it off. After about 30 minutes, she got up and ate her food and wanting to go outside. She will still bark but she will be a dog, not a zombie.
customer_reviews.author: J@CK WILSON,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Collar works
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this collar ..I have tried many and none calmed him like this one has... he no longer scratches at things trying to get away from the thunder , rain, fireworks for the first time in years he has just laid there relaxed as the noise went on around him
customer_reviews.author: castner409

customer_reviews.title: Works great for firework afraid pets
customer_reviews.text: Our lab mix dog has been a nervous wreck with the constant fireworks in our neighborhood. We were desperate to help him and we didn’t want to drug him so so decided to try this. Worked on the first night. He barely acknowledges the booms now. He’s sleeping better and not jumpy. I am beyond impressed and will be stocking up on these since they need to be replaced monthly. Worth every penny to see our buddy being a normal dog. I wish they made them for people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to Help Our Dog
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue dog has moments of serious anxiety especially when she's riding in a car or on a plane. This summer we were moving and needed to travel by car and plane to get to our new home. We put the collar on her a few hours before we the first car ride and we could tell she was totally zen and chilled out. All throughout our travel we noted that she seemed less anxious than we expected. Her anxiety wasn't gone but it was reduced and we have to credit the collar. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lainie McKeating

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got it for one of my dogs that gets grumpy with some dogs off and on as well as to help him with his increasing fear of certain sounds as he's gotten older. It seems to help mellow him out, especially from getting quite so grumpy. Tried the Adaptil brand collars when I couldn't find the Fedciory and they didn't seem to work as well and certainly didn't smell as nice. The scent is a bit strong out of the package but after a couple days mellows. I enjoy the fragrance even though I'm very sensitive to strong scents.
customer_reviews.author: Khazad

customer_reviews.title: Great results for us!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this collar for our dog that just had luxating patella surgery followed by an ACL surgery. Since he’s only 3 years old he is still a ball of energy and not used to staying still and such little activity. This collar definitely helps mellow him out. It’s easy to put on and fits him well, doesn’t bother him at all. We are going to try other products from this company throughout his recovery due to how well this is working for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Works great for anxious dogs
customer_reviews.text: I work with a dog rescue and usually have at least one foster dog in the house, along with my own five large dogs. My oldest dog, an old hound dog, tends to object to the puppies and young dogs that often visit. She gets just plain cranky! I ordered this collar after having good success with a similar collar for cats. There has been a definite improvement in her attitude since she started wearing it. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Red 0524

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy and a really smooth transaction. My package arrived quickly, so I was able to help my bery nervous rescue dog as soon as possible. The collar adjusted easily to fit her and is working wonderfully for her anxiety! I love the results so much, I have already ordered a second one so I’m ready to go when the supply of oheremones on the first one begin weakening.
customer_reviews.author: D. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, adjustable size, and pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It has a pleasant smell when you first open the package. I let my pup smell it bc I didn’t want her to be afraid of something new. I put it on her and within 30 mins she seemed to be calmer. She is only 10 months old so she still has a lot of puppy in her. She was still playful! We just noticed that when strangers would come around she would shake like she was scared. I feel like this will be just what we need!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Takes the Whine out of a Whining Dog
customer_reviews.text: Our beloved Lola has anxiety and a whine that tends to soothe her but is a lot to take on as a household when we are home. I ordered the stress color to help her feel soothed and calm. Her whining has cut back immensely. She seems a bit more mellow and the purchase was definitely worth it vs. medication. I like that we have a natural collar on her.
customer_reviews.author: Jackee Olson

customer_reviews.title: Positive change!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after our dog was showing increased signs of anxiety. Our vet had recommended another brand, but it had horrible reviews. We have definitely noticed a positive change in her behavior with the collar on. It smells very nice, it’s not an over powering smell either. We’re going to continue using this brand as it seems to take the edge off for her.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Helps ease doggy anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dog to use the night of the 4th of July, for obvious reasons. The fireworks have been popping in our neighborhood all month, and she gets very wound up from even just one loud bang. I had been giving her calming chews, and they really weren’t working. I put this on her early in the morning and she was very calm and relaxed throughout the day. I was able to pet her through the massive noise storm and this collar helped immensely- she didn’t run around the house or go crazy as usual. I’ve used other retail collars before and they didn’t really work as effective as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hurson

customer_reviews.title: First one I tried, pretty good results
customer_reviews.text: First pheromone collar we tried but it seems to be a high quality product! It doesn’t stretch but there’s plenty of length to cut to size. We even hid the scrap cut my off under the my dog’s kennel in hopes that he’d (let us) sleep better. Thus far we’ve had pretty good results (paired with lots of training and positive reinforcement) in decreasing our new Rescue’s anxiety. Will plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: The fedciory calming pheromone collar is great. It was a quick delivery and the quality of the collar was good. It can fit a little it large dog because it's so easy to size it. It also has a pleasant scent and had helped it puppy settle down. I was desperate and tried anything but really didn't believe it would work. To my surprise it did!!! My puppy Rosco does not mind wearing it. It has been almost 30 days if him wearing it. Time to order another one. Thank you for a good product!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth conran

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it on our dog for a couple of days so it's hard to gauge how well its working. Our dog is a submissive pee-er and gets anxious fairly easy. He seems calmer in his behavior. I'll post an update after a few weeks if I notice a big difference or none at all. It's the gray band around his neck. Its durable, definitely great length and can adjust accordingly. Smell is not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A.

customer_reviews.title: Good dog!
customer_reviews.text: The product smells good like lavender. I'm not sure what pheromones are in it, but it appears to help my 13 year old Flat Coat Retriever. She has separation anxiety and has chewed thru doors and windows. Replacing the matching french doors was $4000. The windows will be $10000 because they are special windows. Some people might want to abandon her or shoot her because if it, but she's been an awesome dog, and if a $20 a month collar fixes the problem, then that's a small price to pay for a good dog.
customer_reviews.author: N Farnham

customer_reviews.title: This collar really does help.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a calming collar before. When my little girl had puppies I noticed she was pacing a lot and panting. I took her to the vet to make sure she was alright. After the vet gave her the ok, she suggested these collars that maybe she was nervous. Since I have put the collar on her she seams a lot more relaxed and doesn’t pace or seam agitated.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Can fit a dog twice her size but...
customer_reviews.text: This product is basically just a perfume collar. Smells lovely. And makes her smell so nice when she’s been out for a run but it does not sooth at all. She’s still screaming when I leave Her in the crate for the day and still very nervous around most things as before. She’s a socialized dog and put in her crate with her Kong and interactive toys as well as exercised regularly since she’s a hunting breed. Unfortunately, this was not the product. This was my last resort before medication.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CALMING EFFECT ON OUR DOG
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE TRIED ANOTHER BRAND BEFORE USING THIS COLLAR AND I FOUND THIS ONE HAD A MUCH MORE PLEASANT SMELL AND ALSO SEEMS TO BE MORE EFFECTIVE . THIS SEEMS TO REALLY HELP MY DOG WITH HIS FEAR OF FIREWORKS . THEY STILL BOTHER HIM BUT HE NO LONGER RUNS AND HIDES . THE CLASP BUILT IN WORKS GOOD AND OVERALL THE MATERIAL IS MORE FLEXIBLE . GREAT PRODUCT FOR STRESSFUL TIMES
customer_reviews.author: james b

customer_reviews.title: The best anxiety and stress collar for your pet
customer_reviews.text: This product is phenomenal! I should’ve bought more of them just to have around the house and one for my other dog, maybe I will do that in the future. I definitely recommend this product to everybody who owns a dog or a cat with anxiety and stress.
customer_reviews.author: David Kristufek

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase for anxious dog
customer_reviews.text: My 10-month old puppy has been using this collar for about 1-2 weeks and I haven't noticed a tremendous difference in her behavior. She has severe separation anxiety and barks incessantly when I leave, oftentimes breaking out of her crate when left alone. I actually don't mind the scent of the collar and have noticed that it stays on really well. Even during activities like going on a run or playing at the dog park it hasn't slipped or fallen off. If your dog just needs a bit of help calming down I would recommend trying it out in conjunction with other methods (medication, CBD, playing TV/music, etc.) - it can't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cavey

customer_reviews.title: Results may vary
customer_reviews.text: This product did not really seem to have much of an impact on my hyper/anxious senior dog. It did give off an odor, but it was not off-putting. The collar was good quality and would have been a great deal had it worked on my dog. This is just one of those products though that doesn't work the same for everyone. I would recommend giving it a try because your results may differ from mine. Really wish it helped my dog stop barking some, but sadly it just didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: We have two very active puppies, ages 8 months and 3 months, who also have a lot of anxieties including loud noises. So we have these collars a shot and so far, they appear to be helping. They are both able to sleep through noisy situations which used to wake them, and are much calmer with strangers around, something that used to spook them easily.
customer_reviews.author: W.T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is VERY strong and I have not noticed any difference in my dogs. After two weeks it was hrs to keep them on the dogs, they kept falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful, awful smell
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past the awful odor. I didn’t want to even have my dog come close to me. So, I can’t speak to it’s effectiveness or not, as I had to take it off him after about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindasue

customer_reviews.title: This collar really works! Almost like magic!
customer_reviews.text: We got this collar to help with our new puppies anxiety outside and in the car. Before this collar, our puppy hated the car (cried, whined, barked, tried to get out) and every car ride was miserable. With this collar on him, he was almost a different dog! He was relaxed enough, still uneasy, but our car ride was drastically better. This collar helped him get comfortable in the car and now he no longer freaks out. It also helps him remain calm outside! Told all of our friends to buy one, too!
customer_reviews.author: katherine levaton

customer_reviews.title: A simple way to calm your pet.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a tendency to get nervous during storms or when there is a change in her routine. She wears a thunder vest, as a general rule, during these times. A vest can be quite hot during the summer, especially if your dog has long hair. Decided to give the calming collar a try. After about an hour I started to notice a change in my dog's behavior. Much calmer. This collar really works!! Very simple and easy to use. I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: KLT

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This collar has a very pleasant smell. My pup doesn’t seem to mind having it on and it stays on all day long with no problem. She does seem much calmer these days, although we made a few other changes too, so it’s hard to say if this is what calmed her. Overall, it seems worth a try if you have a nervous pup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! Calming Collar for Dog
customer_reviews.text: I was in the final stages of training our 4 month old puppy, he was still having accidents here and there. I purchased this Fedciory Calming Collar at our Vets suggestion, and it has DONE THE JOB!! It calms our pup enough that he thinks about his actions, and we literally have not had a SINGLE accident in our house since wearing the collar. This collar has made our puppy a much more relaxed and calm member of our household!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Calmer Dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a Boston Terrier and she is terrified of noises. She ends up shaking and hiding from the Gardener, the Vacuum, my grandsons, Facetime, etc. This has definitely helped. She is overall much calmer. She still is afraid and hides and shakes but her demeanor is much calmer. I would recommend for any dog that is nervous. The smell is nice ....not troublesome for me or my husband.
customer_reviews.author: KANDT

customer_reviews.title: If anything, it’ll make your dog smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got a foster dog who was extremely extremely stressed and fearful. Would not come out of his crate unless he was trying to escape or was starving. I tried a combination of everything I could find online. This collar is what I saw make the biggest difference. It isn’t a miracle worker, it has not completely changed my dog. But he sleeps outside of his crate(as pictured), which is huge. He gets less scared outside on the leash. Just small improvements that you see when he has the collar on. Also, he smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Provides relief
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for fireworks and thunderstorms! Decided to try this for my border collie with his anxiety over those loud noises. It definitely seems to provide relief and brings his anxiety down quite a bit. He still hides in the bathroom or under my bed, but it's an improvement from jumping at the door and barking or whining.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Just try it - you and your puppy will be both happy
customer_reviews.text: Just try it - you and your puppy will be both happy. We had our puppy on the first week and all of us here were sleep deprived due every hour the puppy will whine looking for his siblings and mom. I read the review about this and was convinced to purchase however, I read some reviews that this collar sometimes might cause irritation to the skin. I have not used it but I think this will make you and your puppy happy :)
customer_reviews.author: BURNSG

customer_reviews.title: Helped us on our first night
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try this collar for our dog to help with anxiety during July 4 and Summer thunderstorms. Our first night with the product was July 3rd and many of our neighbors were celebrating a little early with the fireworks. We put the collar on our dog and immediately she seemed to be less anxious. She was actually laying down on the floor in the living room during the fireworks, which usually she would be hiding in the basement. We definitely recommend this product to others and plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, seems to really work!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I put this on my dog, my partner keeps remarking that it's like he's a different dog. He's been wearing it almost 2 weeks. He struggles with fear based reactivity and I think it helps him a lot. I also love that it gives off a pleasant lavender chamomile smell. At first it's pretty strong and fills the room. I call my dog my "walking air freshener" now <3
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: The scent is overpowering. I thought it would dissipate, but it hasn't. My dog doesn't seem to be affected by this collar in the least bit. Unfortunately, either it doesn't really work, or mine is defective. Update: I left the collar on longer to see if things would change. Nope. This collar doesn't appear to have any effect at all on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us :(
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all for our dog who has high anxiety and is very hyper. Disappointed :/
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calms Tex and non-stink!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands of calming collars that have worked well with my pups anxiety... the only downside is when I’m snuggling with my boy, the material or ‘hormones’ smell awful. His neck literally is stinky. I can say this is not at all the case with the Fedciory Collar!! Seems to do the job just as well as the more known brands but- at a lesser cost AND doesn’t have any odd odors coming from the collar. Works for us! We’re both pleased. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: First time trying - working great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on this one - the first day I put it on my Westie he laid down and fell asleep in our bedroom (prior to the collar he could never settle down, always up and down, hearing noises, etc). We also had good luck our first time leaving him at home and taking our other dog on a walk (typically our Westie freaks out). We left our son at home to hear/see what happened and our puppy was still happily chewing a bone when we came back. This one is a keeper and will order more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Northern Pike

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not a good fit for my pup
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my dog’s trainer because of my dog’s anxious demeanor. Pros: - Easy to use. - Stays in place. (As far as I know, my dog has not tried to remove the collar and if she has, she has not been successful.) - Smells nice. (Some other reviews complain about the strong smell, and they are right—it is strong. But I find the smell quite pleasant!) Cons: - After about a week of wear, I haven’t noticed any changes in my dog’s demeanor. In all honesty, my dog’s issues are probably too far gone for this collar to help, but we wanted to try it before moving on to stronger options.
customer_reviews.author: Amber N.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help our girl
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for our Penny, who has had some issues with riding in the car. We put it on when we are planning to go somewhere, and she seems to do a little better with it. We have accidentally left the house without it, and can tell the difference with her anxiety. So it seems to be helping...
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: My labradoodle suffers from severe anxiety and I have tried everything like medication prescribed by our vet and natural remedies but this collar has been the only thing that worked. Like the product information said...after about one hour after putting it on he has calm. I also loved the fact that it’s waterproof because we give him baths often. Totally recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: GSK

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1 yr old Toy Poodle who is very hyper, chews on everything & can even jump on our dining room table flat footed! This collar was immediately great! The effectiveness wore off a bit after a couple of days, but it still calms him down a good bit & his chewing has lessened considerably.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: makes your dog smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen yet how it works in Thunder Storms but since people are not stopping doing fireworks he no longer shakes but still refuses to go outside at night when this is going on. He was so traumatized on the 4th he trembled and panted a wined. But now is fine with that part qs long as he isw inide.
customer_reviews.author: suzette b.

customer_reviews.title: Helps pups with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this collar for our 9 yr old pup who is insecure and has ongoing anxiety. He’s always been this way. We’ve tried cbd- doesn’t work on him. We’ve tried the anxiety vest- kind of works or could be a placebo (placebo on us haha). THIS COLLAR is working very well. He is moaning less. The collar does have a scent to it.... kind of reminds me of a generic bathroom botanical spray. That lasts for only a couple days. Now it’s so faint you’d have to be right up on it to get the scent. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant results!
customer_reviews.text: This collar was amazing! I’m so thankful I found it. We were given a 6 week beagle puppy that was in desperate need of a home. He cried for 6 nights straight 😭 my husband and I were so tired! As soon as this collar came in I put it on him. OMG he immediately calmed down. No lie! I was amazed! I couldn’t believe how he calmed down. He slept for 7 hrs that night- a true blessing. I wish we had found it earlier, would have saved me some sleepless nights. It’s smells good too. Made him smell like baby powder and lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Good price, wonderful fragrance.......glad to see my pup relaxed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my overly zealous Plott Hound who is just 1 yr old and full of energy. We adopted her from the shelter so she has a few challenges!! I love this is natural, smells amazing and works! She is more at ease and still has energy but it is not that crazy "I can't contain myself"! Ordering again!!
customer_reviews.author: SZQ

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My chiweenie has been so very afraid of thunder, and fire works for his 9 years. I put the collar on two days ago and last night there were fireworks. He didn't react at all. Such a blessing. This is the only collar of this type I have tried but I think I will continue with this brand because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Old guy in Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Next stop: The Vet
customer_reviews.text: Sorry. The color did not help our energetic 11 month poodle. We tried it for three days and realized the collar kept getting looser. We were afraid she’d eat the collar, so we pitched it in the trash. We will be checking with our vet on criteria that might make pheromones calm our dog.
customer_reviews.author: elecia k almekinder

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and adjust to the correct length for my dog's neck. It's only been on my Golden Retriever for 2 days, so it's hard to tell if it's helping him yet. He's an anxious dog that constantly licks his paws, the floor, people, etc. Hoping to get him some anxiety relief. I will update in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Works for Vet Appt
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome! My fiance and I got a new 11 month old dog and she did not like the vet on her first visit. She was aggressive towards the staff. We Ultimately had to re-schedule her vet appointment. I put this collar on my dog and her second vet appointment was a success. She did not snap at staff so she got to take her muzzle off. I'm so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Brown

customer_reviews.title: One dog mama that believes
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I bought it to help my Rhodesian Ridgeback with anxiety for the Fouth of July. Thought I would put it on her about a week before the holiday. Coco is a completely different dog, so calm and relaxed it's truly amazing to see what a difference this collar has made. Where have you been all my life, I only wish I would have discovered this year's ago. This is one dog mama that believes, and I will be buying this product again !!!!
customer_reviews.author: jrndeb

customer_reviews.title: Calming collar really works!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this calming collar for a couple months on the advice our our Vet. We waited to do a review until we saw if there were results. Our rescue dog has calmed down! The scent is a strong pleasant pine scent. His behavior improves immediately. We will continue to reorder this product for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Low profile and Smells Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My new dog is suffering from separation anxiety. This collar was suggested by our vet so we decided to try it out. So far it is working wonderfully. It is low profile and blends easily with her other collar. I was worried that it would be too bulky and bother her, it does not! I was also worried that I would hate the scent. It was very strong at first but now it is a pleasant smell that I only get a whiff of if I am hugging and kissing on her. I definitely recommend trying this for your pup if they are suffering from any type of stress or anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product- takes the edge off
customer_reviews.text: Since using the collar, I’ve noticed that my dog seems calmer and less reactive. Walks outside used to cause extreme anxiety for her and myself due to her anxiety and overactive tendencies. This collar especially when it is new and the scent is strong really helps lessen her anxieties - even slightly better during storms too. The smell is strong at first but it is pleasant and I think it keeps her smelling nice all of the time. I will continue to purchase. I already have another one ready to go when the scent runs out on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy C

customer_reviews.title: Love the Calm
customer_reviews.text: My 3 senior dogs have definitely felt the difference wearing these collars. They are now a staple in our household. Before I started using this collar. My dogs suffered from separation anxiety, but no more now! Thank you from Carnegie, 16 y/o. Shadow, 12 y/o and Marley, 11 y/o.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brown

customer_reviews.title: It did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: So far, my puppy still crying. He keeps scratching himself to take it off. It does has a nice pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: It worked temporarily
customer_reviews.text: The product did great for about 2 days. And for some odd reason my dog liked the smell of it and chewed it up. My personally the smell was very overwhelming but I'm pregnant but I managed to salvage what's left of the collar and it works when she allows. And I have a 3 month old jack Russell terrier
customer_reviews.author: Devona M

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a couple of hours that Coco has had the collar on but I do see a difference in her behavior. She isn't jumping crazy or barking at everything. If this goes this way for the next 15 days which is midway through then I will be buying more. And the scent is fantastic and calming.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Best calming collar I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs anxiety has grown to an everyday event. He’s scared of everything! I mean, fireplaces,The sound of the AC, thunderstorms, us cooking or chopping, loud car doors slamming outside. We decided to try the calming collar as a last effort before putting him on medication. Besides the lovely smell of essential oils on him, he has chilled out significantly. Very much hope the collar continues to work for him. I would definitely recommend trying the collar, before trying prescription drugs. It’s a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Green

customer_reviews.title: It Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this really works. My dog can tell when a storm is coming even if it's sunny outside. He shakes and pants. With this product I would say 909% of his symptoms are gone. It also has a calming effect on him all day long. I would suggest giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Trehey

customer_reviews.title: Actually WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 English Bulldogs and my youngest one is very excitable..now they are all excitable. I never thought these things would work but I was AMAZED they do!! They really do. I use them on a regular basis now and the minute I put a new one on each of them...all I hear are snoring bulldogs. And when it starts to wear off- which is about that 30 day mark...I can tell its time to order again!! I love them and will continue to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & BJ

customer_reviews.title: This collar is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet and kind rescue dog has been a bundle of anxiety for years. She whimpers when she is happy, sad, hungry, etc. She shakes when people come into our house, and is still shaking once they leave. Her anxious behaviors changed overnight once we put the Fedciory Calming Collar on her. She started interacting with our other dogs, slept through the night, and has even began being playful again. It has been a wonderful transformation for her and our family. We wanted to avoid giving her prescription medicine for anxiety, and so thankful our veterinarian recommending we try this first. You won't be disappointed with this AWESOME product.
customer_reviews.author: Allanc

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay together
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to try this out for my dog instead of brand I've been having him wear. The collar does have a peculiar odor and after 3 weeks, it loosened. My dog scratched the adjustment tabs so it wouldn't stay on. I don't think I will buy it again. He wasn't as calm after it loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Girly Gurl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay on tight
customer_reviews.text: Didnt seem to work, but unfortunately I didn't have it long enough to truly tell if it worked or not. From day one, it wouldn't stay on my dog (granted he has a large head/neck- he's 70 lbs). Any movement and it would start to loosen then eventually fall off. After a few days of tightening it daily to keep it on him, it fell off unnoticed and was gone for good.
customer_reviews.author: kkhk12

customer_reviews.title: This really helped!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this collar for my brother's dog who was no longer able to live with my brother and his family because of her behavior. When she came to stay with us, she had many of the same behaviors. She was anxious and jealous and controlling over my dog. She had already been on a few different meds from the vet, so when I saw this collar and read the reviews, I thought it was worth a shot. We did see a noticeable difference! She was definitely calmer and was able to handle attention going to my dog as well. We are grateful to find something that helped, and are going to continue ordering this collar!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen DiMattia

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My dog went crazy every time someone walked another dog by my house. We used the collar and within a few hours it made a big difference he would still go to the fence but didn't go crazy barking and running down the fence line. Would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately did not help my two
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say they did nothing for my two dogs. The collars were also a little thick for a 20 lb dog. It may work for others but not here.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference in behavior.
customer_reviews.text: We have a fiesty German Shorthair who has been fighting with our other dogs in the house. The stress it was causing was unreal. My mom suggested a calming collar, I was reluctant, But willing to try anything. She has worn it for two weeks now and there is a noticeable difference in her behavior. She has not tried to start one fight. We are still cautious and do not leave her alone with the other dogs, but I would definitely say this caller has created a calmer state in her.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Latragna

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beautiful dog however lately she feels sad and anxious and started bite walls and shoes so I found this product online and I am completly happy I can see my dog is happy and feels more relax. I definely recommed this product
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gómez

customer_reviews.title: It helps my dog in a storm
customer_reviews.text: I've used this collar several times during thunder storms and it helps my dog be calmer. The trick is to get the collar on as soon as I hear thunder or she starts acting nervous. I'm not sure how long the collar will last, but plan to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dog House

product_meta.title: Fedciory Calming Pheromone Collar for Dogs Adjustable Collars with Long-Lasting Calm Effect Relieve Anxiety for All Small Medium and Large Dog (25 Inches)
product_meta.description:
Calming Collar for All Dogs - 30 Days Continuous Calm

. Color: Grey

. Length: 25.59 in / 65 cm

. Width: 0.59 in / 1.5 cm

. Weight: 0.70 oz / 20 gr

. Shipping Weight: 0.88 oz / 25 gr

WHAT MAKES IT THE BEST CHOICE?

1, One Size Fits All, just cut the extra length to create your dogs perfect fit.

2, Easy to Use, the dog clam collar features an adjustable system of teeth to prevent loosening.

3, Waterproof, no necessary to remove the collar when taking a bath or playing in the rain.

4, Made from natural ingredients, safe, no-harm, no-addiction, no-chemical ingredients.

5, Activated by body heat, emit Pheromones with pleasant relaxing lavender smell.

6, Immediate effect within 1 Hour, continuous calming effect lasts up to 30 Days.

7, Safe for long-term use, should be worn continuously and replaced every 4 weeks.

8, Provides a strong signal of comfort and security to dogs regardless of outside conditions.

9, Suits rightened, stressed, anxious, or hyperactive dogs, helps improve their unwanted behavior.

10, Alleviates problem behaviors caused by fear, stress, being in heat, loud noise, transportation, traveling, vet's visit, etc. or at least calms your pet.

11, Alleviates problem behaviors caused by being alone, thunderstorm, etc.or increase focus during training sessions or adapt to new surroundings.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

If you are not satisfied with collars in 30 days, you’re guaranteed to get your money back 100%, no questions asked from the seller.
feature_bullets: 【Calming collar for dogs】Vet recommended collar to help dogs adjust to challenging situations and curb stress-related unwanted behaviors through Pheromone. Hypoallergenic, no-harm, no-addiction, no side effects.

【30 Days Fast & Continuous Calm】 Collar starts working within 1 hour, and continues to release the pheromone for up to 30 days to provides a strong signal of comfort and security to your dogs and puppies. Worn continuously and replaced every 4 weeks for best results. All dogs are unique, results may vary.

【Safe & Effective】Made from natural ingredients, this dog lavender collar is activated by body Heat to emit an odorless pheromone to frightened, stressed, anxious, or hyperactive pet, reduce fear of loud noises, bad behavior and barking, increase focus during training sessions or adapt to new surroundings.

【Adjustable & Flexible Size】 25. 59 inches/ 65 cm length, our calm collar suits almost puppy, small, Medium, Large dogs. Help your dog feel safe and calm at home or on the go: Great for stopping problem barking, destructive chewing, trembling, fear of loud noises, separation anxiety, and many other symptoms - even at the vet!

【100% Satisfaction】 We are so confident that you will love our collar that if you are unhappy with it for any reason, we would like to put a smile back on your face, we will fully refund your purchase, No questions asked!
